title: Wide recommendations
content:
Looking for recommendations for excellent wide sans serif typefaces.  
so far I have Knockout 94, but looking for more angular options.
author: adevejian

comments.content: Can you explain what you mean by “angular”?

Maybe ’angular’ is inaccurate.  
I guess a font that is less curvilinear than Knockout. more like a Din, for example.

So more machined, colder, mechanical, less hand-made?  
 [Pill Gothic Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024237/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000304)  
 [FF Clan Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024237/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_clan_ot_wide/) and [Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024237/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_clan_ot_extended/)  
 [FF Signa Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024237/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_signa_ot_extended/)  
 [Eurostile Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024237/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/eurostile_std_ot_virtual/)  
 [FF QType Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024237/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=QType%20Extended%20OT)

I’m working on a website now using [Titling Gothic Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20091003024237/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=titling+gothic+extended&x=0&y=0) and it is beautiful, if I do say so myself. :)

Sharon
I should have a link ready by early next week. :-)
